#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
 
#define M 1000000007
 
using namespace std;
 
int main() {
	int t,n;
	long long int a, out;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	
	while(t--){
		out = 1;
		scanf("%d", &n);
		while(n--){
			scanf("%lld", &a);
			out = (out * (a%M))%M;
		}
		printf("%lld\n", out);
	}
	
	return 0;
}
